channel.title: [Help]Webclient = being lame
channel.description:
So I followed this tut [url=http://forums.google.co.uk/index.php?topic=1695.0]http://forums.google.co.uk/index.php?topic=1695.0[/url] on how to make my client a webclient and did everything right i had some troubles with the sprite thing though i couldnt find it in my class9.java.. So I carried on and did the lunar ones and then I made Client.jar the way it says and signed it and everything but when I put the html on a website it gets stuck at "Starting up"
I will answer any questions about what I did and what I have to fix this, please help.

item.title: [Help]Webclient = being lame
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

the link isnt working, u should fix it. Or we wont be able to help you. We need to see what it said in the post that your talking about.

So I followed this tut http://forums.google.co.uk/index.php?topic=1695.0 on how to make my client a webclient and did everything right i had some troubles with the sprite thing though i couldnt find it in my class9.java…
